verses.verse: Afterward he <S%H3212>brought<s%> me to the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> even the <S%H8179>gate<s%> that <S%H6437>looks<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east:<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6921>east:<s%> and his <S%H6963>voice<s%> was like a <S%H6963>noise<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters:<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H215>shined<s%> with his <S%H3519>glory.<s%>

And it was according to the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H4758>vision<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7200>saw,<s%> even according to the <S%H4758>vision<s%> that I <S%H7200>saw<s%> when I <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H5892>city:<s%> and the <S%H4759>visions<s%> were like the <S%H4758>vision<s%> that I <S%H7200>saw<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H3529>Chebar;<s%> and I <S%H5307>fell<s%> on my <S%H6440>face.<s%>

And the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H6440>prospect<s%> is <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east.<s%>

So the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> me up, and <S%H935>brought<s%> me <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house.<s%>
And I <S%H8085>heard<s%> him <S%H1696>speaking<s%> to me out of the <S%H1004>house;<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> by me.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of my <S%H3678>throne,<s%> and the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of my <S%H7272>feet,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for <S%H5769>ever,<s%> and my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> shall the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H2930>defile,<s%> neither they, nor their <S%H4428>kings,<s%> by their <S%H2184>prostitution,<s%> nor by the <S%H6297>carcasses<s%> of their <S%H4428>kings<s%> in their <S%H1116>high<s%> places.

In their <S%H5414>setting<s%> of their <S%H5592>threshold<s%> by my <S%H5592>thresholds,<s%> and their <S%H4201>post<s%> by my <S%H4201>posts,<s%> and the <S%H7023>wall<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and them, they have even <S%H2930>defiled<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> by their <S%H8441>abominations<s%> that they have <S%H6213>committed:<s%> why I have <S%H398>consumed<s%> them in my <S%H639>anger.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> let them <S%H7368>put<s%> <S%H7368>away<s%> their <S%H2184>prostitution,<s%> and the <S%H6297>carcasses<s%> of their <S%H4428>kings,<s%> <S%H7350>far<s%> from me, and I will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of them for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

You <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5046>show<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they may be <S%H3637>ashamed<s%> of their <S%H5771>iniquities:<s%> and let them <S%H4058>measure<s%> the <S%H8508>pattern.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> they be <S%H3637>ashamed<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that they have <S%H6213>done,<s%> <S%H3045>show<s%> them the <S%H6699>form<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and the <S%H8498>fashion<s%> thereof, and the <S%H4161>goings<s%> out thereof, and the <S%H4126>comings<s%> in thereof, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6699>forms<s%> thereof, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2708>ordinances<s%> thereof, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6699>forms<s%> thereof, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8451>laws<s%> thereof: and <S%H3789>write<s%> it in their <S%H5869>sight,<s%> that they may <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H6699>form<s%> thereof, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2708>ordinances<s%> thereof, and <S%H6213>do<s%> them.

<S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H1004>house;<s%> On the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1366>limit<s%> thereof <S%H5439>round<s%> about shall be <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H4060>measures<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> after the <S%H520>cubits:<s%> The <S%H520>cubit<s%> is a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and an <S%H2948>hand<s%> <S%H2948>breadth;<s%> even the <S%H2436>bottom<s%> shall be a <S%H520>cubit,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> a <S%H520>cubit,<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> thereof by the <S%H8193>edge<s%> thereof <S%H5439>round<s%> about shall be a <S%H2239>span:<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> shall be the <S%H1354>higher<s%> place of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And from the <S%H2436>bottom<s%> on the <S%H776>ground<s%> even to the <S%H8481>lower<s%> <S%H5835>settle<s%> shall be <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H520>cubit;<s%> and from the <S%H6996>lesser<s%> <S%H5835>settle<s%> even to the <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H5835>settle<s%> shall be <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> one <S%H520>cubit.<s%>
So the <S%H741>altar<s%> shall be <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and from the <S%H741>altar<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> shall be <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7161>horns.<s%>

And the <S%H741>altar<s%> shall be <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> cubits <S%H753>long,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H7341>broad,<s%> <S%H7251>square<s%> in the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7253>squares<s%> thereof.

And the <S%H5835>settle<s%> shall be <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H6246><s%> cubits <S%H753>long<s%> and <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H6246><s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%> in the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7253>squares<s%> thereof; and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5439>about<s%> it shall be <S%H2677>half<s%> a <S%H520>cubit;<s%> and the <S%H2436>bottom<s%> thereof shall be a <S%H520>cubit<s%> <S%H5439>about;<s%> and his <S%H4609>stairs<s%> shall <S%H6437>look<s%> toward the <S%H6921>east.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H2708>ordinances<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when they shall <S%H6213>make<s%> it, to <S%H5927>offer<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offerings <S%H5921>thereon,<s%> and to <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5921>thereon.<s%>

And you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> that be of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok,<s%> which <S%H7138>approach<s%> to me, to <S%H8334>minister<s%> to me, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering.

And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof, and <S%H5414>put<s%> it <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7161>horns<s%> of it, and <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6438>corners<s%> of the <S%H5835>settle,<s%> and on the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about: thus shall you <S%H2398>cleanse<s%> and <S%H3722>purge<s%> it.

You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> also of the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, and he shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> it in the <S%H4662>appointed<s%> place of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary.<s%>

And on the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H8163>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering; and they shall <S%H2398>cleanse<s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> as they did <S%H2398>cleanse<s%> it with the <S%H6499>bullock.<s%>

When you have made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H2893>cleansing<s%> it, you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> out of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish.<s%>

And you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H4417>salt<s%> on them, and they shall <S%H5927>offer<s%> them up for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall you <S%H6213>prepare<s%> every <S%H3117>day<s%> a <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering: they shall also <S%H3559>prepare<s%> a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> out of the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish.<s%>
<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall they <S%H3722>purge<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and <S%H2891>purify<s%> it; and they shall <S%H3027>consecrate<s%> <S%H3027>themselves.<s%>

And when these <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H3615>expired,<s%> it shall be, that on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and so <S%H1973>forward,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H6213>make<s%> your <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offerings on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and your <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings; and I will <S%H7521>accept<s%> you, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
